org.neo4j.graphdb.schema

Interface IndexDefinition


  • public interface IndexDefinition
    Definition for an index NOTE: This is part of the index API introduced in Neo4j 2.0. The legacy index API lives in IndexManager.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drop()
      Drops this index.
      Label getLabel() 
      Iterable<String> getPropertyKeys() 
      boolean isConstraintIndex() 

    • Method Detail

      • getLabel

        Label getLabel()
        Returns:
        the label this index definition is associated with.

      • getPropertyKeys

        Iterable<String> getPropertyKeys()
        Returns:
        the property keys this index was created on.

      • drop

        void drop()
        Drops this index. Schema.getIndexes(Label) will no longer include this index and any related background jobs and files will be stopped and removed.

      • isConstraintIndex

        boolean isConstraintIndex()
        Returns:
        true if this index is created as a side effect of the creation of a uniqueness constraint.
